CustomField.description: This is the RICHEY MAY EMPLOYEE who originated the opportunity - aka the first person to talk to them. This is likely to be the same as lead owner, but doesn't have to be!
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the RICHEY MAY EMPLOYEE who originated the opportunity - aka the first person to talk to them. This is likely to be the same as lead owner, but doesn't have to be!
CustomField.label: Opportunity Originator
